text: Aker Solutions ASA, is an engineering company based in Oslo, Norway. The company has operations in Norway. == History == The company was founded in 1841. Aker Solutions was known as Aker Kværner until 2008. On 3 April 2008, the company announced that it was changing its name - to Aker Solutions. In 2014, Aker Solutions was divided to two companies, Aker Solutions and Akastor. In 2020, the company merged with Kværner ASA. == References == Category:Companies of Norway Category:Engineering companies Category:2008 establishments in Europe
title: Aker Solutions
